info.description:
As I never seen combination of futa & enslavement here, I decided to create this story.
Rules are:
No killing
You can be boy or girl and you can be either slave or master.
Enslavement can be done by blackmailing, enslaving spell or shrinking (doesn't matter if magically or by machine)
...being shrunken by futanari sounds especially good for me


Edit: I was asked couple of questions
1. Is cooperative enslavement allowed (for example, could peter and Sarah cooperatively hold Molly as a slave)
--- combinations are not in default list, but it IS possible to do this by two ways
----- a) later in story add another master (or maybe add same way another slave)
----- b) if you want 2 masters from begining, just ask me and I will add this special scenario into list
2. Can there be more than one futanari in a storyline?
--- why not, another can move in to town, but invent some good plot about her coming-out
3. machines/spells have other abilities than shrinking/enslaving (for example, increased sex drive, increase in genital size, growth, etc)
--- I was planning to have them only as way how to shrink slaves, but increasing genitals sounds good... increased sex drive - not so good, maybe as torture (increase slaves sex drive and then not let them pleasure themselfs...)..... and for growth - there is lot of giant(ess) stories, so I dont think they are necessary... but futa-giantess are very rare, so I aprove them
4. can the tables turn? (can a slave take over and make the master into a slave)
--- again, why not

>>btw: don't start by enslaving, keep even possibility to BE enslaven
>>I have got some ideas, for example to make(I mean - choose at begining) your character futanari OR make one character alien and second futanari
(if you like those ideas, send me a message and I will add them then)

GOOD ADDITIONS WILL BE REWARDED
